# The Okay Language
A Programming Language inspired by Brainfuck and believe me it is okay

## Features
### REPL mode
```
Okay >> okaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaay[okaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaaayokaaaayokaaaaayokaaayokaaayokaaayokaaayokaaaaaay]
Hello World!
Okay >>
```

### Compile & Run
```bash
$ python main.py sample.okay 
Hello World!
```

## Diffrences with Brainfuck
```
. -> okay
, -> okaay
< -> okaaay
> -> okaaaay
+ -> okaaaaay
- -> okaaaaaay
```
